content: this v-neck cardigan comes in two versions short-sleeved or long-sleeved both are knitted flat in one piece top down the sleeves on the short-sleeved verson are shaped with short row this version has no seaming the long-sleeved version is knitted with a minimum of seaming just the underarm seams both were designed especially to fit american girl mini dolls and lori dolls but they will also fit other similarly sized dolls the cardigan is knitted in fingering weight yarn you just need 25-30 yards so this is a good use for those little balls you ve probably been collecting i put the gauge in but i wouldn t worry too much about it at this size it s easier to just start and see if it will fit your doll rather than knit a gauge square this pattern is free but if you want to say thank you please create a project page here on ravelry ****************** see brenda s project page 1 for information on the cute tops she knitted for her twin sets 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/brenda1944/v-neck-cardigans-for-mini-ag-dolls
